name: The Blues Brothers
overview: Cruise along with Jake and Elwood, those all-time rhythm'n'blues men in this engrossing platform game - an explosive mix of adventure, comedy and music. Back by popular demand, the Blues Brothers are out to conquer the stage one more time. To an upbeat rhythm you set off across town to retrieve your stolen instruments... but it ain't that easy. You've got to escape from prison, swim through the catacombs, and shoot to the upper heights of the big city before you can start that concert. Creating chaos and confusion, you encounter Charlie, the crazy cop, and Horatio, the deadly spider... Get ready to play the Blues! They sent the police into a panic They whipped the crowds into a frenzy They redefined Rock'n'Roll music And now... they're ready to do it again
